Description:
Detects the execution of "Ldifde.exe" with the import flag "-i". The can be abused to include HTTP-based arguments which will allow the arbitrary download of files from a remote server.


Author: @gott_cyber
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Import LDAP Data Interchange Format File Via Ldifde.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%-i%' and command like '%-f%') and (process_path like '%\ldifde.exe' and original_file_name = 'ldifde.exe'))
